text: Sabaku no Arabu-tachi wa,`watashi-tachi wa shinko shimasu.' To iu. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa shinjite wa inai. Tada “watashi-tachi wa nyushin shimashita” to itte iru dake de, shinko wa mada anata gata no kokoronouchi ni haitte wa inai. Moshi anata gataga, arra to sono shito ni shitagaunara, kare wa sono okonai ni tsuite, sukoshi mo (hosho o) keigen sa reru koto wanai. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
